thread.title: INSIGHT: 84 rooftop sculptures highlight male suicide

title: INSIGHT: 84 rooftop sculptures highlight male suicide
text:
INSIGHT: 84 rooftop sculptures highlight male suicide   00:46 
A powerful new art installation of 84 life-sized sculptures, designed to represent male suicides, was unveiled on London rooftops on Monday. The campaign, called Project 84, has been built to highlight the fact that 84 men take their own lives every week in the UK.
